label.value: 1) Do you currently have documents or materials in your possession or control, that you wish to provide to the OSC, to support the misconduct?

Electronic supporting documents or materials up to 1 GB in total (up to 20 files) may be attached to this online report. If your files exceed this limit, any files past this limit must be sent directly to the OSC's Office of the Whistleblower, either by mail or courier.
If you plan to send files to our office by mail or courier, please complete this report submission first and take note of the submission ID number that you will receive at time of online submission.
In your mailing to us, please send the information to the OSC's Office of the Whistleblower at the address noted below, and include the following:
Office of the Whistleblower - Confidential Ontario Securities Commission 22nd Floor 20 Queen Street West Toronto, ON M5H 3S8
For future reference, this mailing address is also listed on the website of the
Do you have files to upload?

Please do not reference or attach any documents that may reflect legal advice, that are communications with a lawyer for the purpose of obtaining legal advice or related working papers or that may otherwise be subject to solicitor-client privilege.
For each file you upload, please provide the following details:

Enter a description between 2 and 200 characters long.

label.value: Is it likely to reveal your identity? If yes, please explain

label.value: Once you have uploaded any files and closed the file upload window, you will not be able to view or delete any of the uploaded files.
Do you have files stored on physical storage media and/or physical documents to mail or courier to the Office of the Whistleblower?
Please complete this report submission first, and take note of the submission ID number that you will receive at time of online submission.
In your mailing to us, please send the information to the OSC's Office of the Whistleblower at the address noted below, and include the following:
Office of the Whistleblower - Confidential Ontario Securities Commission 22nd Floor 20 Queen Street West Toronto, ON M5H 3S8
For future reference, this mailing address is also listed on the website of the
2) Are there additional documents or materials available to support the misconduct which are not in your possession or control?
Please describe the additional documents and the location of each document. Please also indicate if any of the additional documents are likely to reveal your identity. (max. 1000 characters)

Please do not reference any documents that may reflect legal advice, that are communications with a lawyer for the purpose of obtaining legal advice or related working papers or that may otherwise be subject to solicitor-client privilege. We do not expect you to obtain documents or other things that are not in your possession or control.

label.value: Which of the following external roles, if any, does or did "Whistleblower #1" have with the entity "Entity #1" at the time of the misconduct?
role (a relationship) with the entity (max. 75 characters):

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') When did "' +. WB_DISPLAYNM2.value +. '" have the role (relationship) of "' +. ROLE_DESC1.value +. '" with the entity "' +. ENTITY_DISPLAYNM2.value +. '"? '

label.value: 4.1) When did "Whistleblower #1" have the role (relationship) of "Other" with the entity "Entity #1"?

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') If you (' +. WB_DISPLAYNM1.value +. ') are or were in-house counsel at the entity that is, or that employs, the subject of this submission, is disclosure of the information you are providing permitted by a lawyer under applicable provincial or territorial bar or law society rules, or the equivalent rules applicable in another jurisdiction? (max. 300 characters) '

label.value: 4.2) If you (Whistleblower #1) are or were in-house counsel at the entity that is, or that employs, the subject of this submission, is disclosure of the information you are providing permitted by a lawyer under applicable provincial or territorial bar or law society rules, or the equivalent rules applicable in another jurisdiction? (max. 300 characters)

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') If you (' +. WB_DISPLAYNM1.value +. ') are or were an internal or external auditor of the subject of this submission, is disclosure of the information you are providing permitted under applicable rules of professional conduct? (max. 300 characters) '

label.value: 4.3) If you (Whistleblower #1) are or were an internal or external auditor of the subject of this submission, is disclosure of the information you are providing permitted under applicable rules of professional conduct? (max. 300 characters)

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') Did "' +. WB_DISPLAYNM1.value +. '" take any steps to escalate concerns internally at the entity "' +. ENTITY_DISPLAYNM1.value +. '"?'

label.value: 4.4) Did "Whistleblower #1" take any steps to escalate concerns internally at the entity "Entity #1"?
Provide the name of the person to whom you reported, his or her position, and the date the misconduct was reported.

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') To your knowledge, did the person(s) or department(s) at the entity "' +. ENTITY_DISPLAYNM1.value +. '" to whom you reported the misconduct take any steps to address your concern(s)?'

label.value: 4.5) To your knowledge, did the person(s) or department(s) at the entity "Entity #1" to whom you reported the misconduct take any steps to address your concern(s)?
Describe the steps taken by the person(s) or department(s) (max. 500 characters):

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') ' +. ((ANONYMOUSFLAG1.value != 'yes') ? ' Did you' : ' Did the whistleblower') +. ' obtain this information while conducting an inquiry or investigation into possible violations of law?'

label.value: 8) Did you obtain this information while conducting an inquiry or investigation into possible violations of law?

xforms:textarea.xforms:help: Enter a description between 2 and 1000 characters long.

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ((ANONYMOUSFLAG1.value != 'yes') ? ') Did you have any involvement in the misconduct?' : ') Was the whistleblower involved in the misconduct?')

label.value: 9) Did you have any involvement in the misconduct?
Describe your involvement (min. 20 and max. 1000 characters):

xforms:textarea.xforms:help: Enter a description between 20 and 1000 characters long.

value.compute: custom:questionNum +. ') Is there anything else you would like to tell us?'

label.value: 10) Is there anything else you would like to tell us?

xforms:textarea.xforms:help: Enter a description between 5 and 1000 characters long.

button.value: Click here to read the OSC Policy 15-601 - Whistleblower Program.

label.value: I have read and understand the OSC Policy 15-601 - Whistleblower Program;
I understand and agree that the OSC is not responsible for any expenses or losses I might incur in connection with providing information and documents to the OSC;
I understand and agree that no immunity from legal proceedings is being given to me by the OSC by reason of me providing information and documents;
I will maintain the confidentiality of any and all information provided by the OSC to me in connection with my submission; and
To the best of my knowledge and belief, all of the information submitted through this form is true and complete.

value.compute: 'I, ' +. WB_DISPLAYNM1.value +. ', certify that I have read and agree to the above certification on ' +. PAGE7.CURRENTDATE1.value +. '.'

label.value: I, [Whistleblower #1], certify that I have read and agree to the above certification on [Date].
Warning: It is an offence under the Ontario Securities Act to knowingly provide false or misleading information to the OSC.
Please review the information above and click on "Submit" to complete your online submission.
Once you submit this online form, you may print the completed form and you will receive a submission ID to retain in your records.

button.value: Click here to read the OSC Policy 15-601 - Whistleblower Program.

label.value: I confirm that I have read OSC Policy 15-601 - Whistleblower Program and explained it to my client, the whistleblower in this matter.
I confirm that I have verified the whistleblower’s identity by viewing valid government issued identification of the whistleblower.
I confirm that the whistleblower has provided me with a complete and signed Whistleblower Submission Form including a Whistleblower certification, the originals of which I will retain in my records.
I have confirmed with the whistleblower that, to the best of their knowledge and belief, the information submitted is true and complete.
As the lawyer representing the whistleblower, please agree to the above counsel certification.

value.compute: 'I, ' +. LAWYER_NM1.value +. ', certify that I have read and agree to the above certification on ' +. PAGE8.CURRENTDATE1.value +. '.'

label.value: I, [Lawyer's Name], certify that I have read and agree to the above certification on [date].
Warning: It is an offence under the Ontario Securities Act to knowingly provide false or misleading information to the OSC.
Please review the information above and click on "Submit" to complete your online submission.
Once you submit this online form, you may print the completed form and you will receive a submission ID to retain in your records.
